ygData.subject: Re: Civil War
ygData.msgSnippet: Yan, read some back posts, Tarantulas TOOK the codes before you decided to take over. Sorry man. With the exhaust filling the Corridors, we wont have to worry

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Yan, read some back posts, Tarantulas TOOK the codes before you decided to 
take over. Sorry man.

       "With the exhaust filling the Corridors, we wont have to worry about 
them getting in here. Now, Tarantulas, get control of the internal defences. 
They have the Autoguns, so I want the shields." Megatron said, leaning over 
his shoulder and looking into the computer monitor.

       Aracnia saw it first, then Gremlin, the exhaust. Together they ran as 
fast as they could. Ahead of them they saw the double doors they needed to 
get into, and with the crossfire of the Autoguns and gas, it was making it 
rather hard. "Quick!" Gremlin yelled, grasping the middle of the doors and 
forcing them open.
       She rolled in and then pulled him in. Behinde them, the doors snapped 
shut. They coucged hard and looked at their arms. It was tarnished from the 
gas. 
       "Alright, now what, cough coucgh." Gremlin said.
       "We go down." Aracnia said, and looking down she kicked a panle of the 
elevators floor down. Beneath it was a long dark shaft, slowly filling with 
the green gas. Slowly.
       Taking some web, she tied it to the ceiling above, and repelled down 
the shaft, followed by Gremlin. 

--part1_3f.d54916b.275abab4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
